en.content: Almost by accident, you discover a channel between two rocks that leads into the cliff face. The daylight is just enough to pick out a recessed chamber, and the man crouched there in silence, glaring at you.
“Damn you,” he snarls. “Haven’t I been tormented enough?” However, he seems a little calmer.

text.content: 你可以在「侦查」技能左边的小方框里打勾。

zh.content: 几乎是巧合之下，你发现两块岩石之间有一道狭窄的通道通往悬崖之内。借着日光，你勉强能发现一片凹进去的石洞，那个男人无声无息地蹲在里面瞪着你。
他低吼道：“你这混账，我被折磨得还不够吗？”不过，他现在看起来平静了一些。

text.content: 你可以在「侦查」技能左边的小方框里打勾。

text.en: You don’t wish to risk it
